ygData.subject: RE: Great post on item balancing (Long)
ygData.msgSnippet: ... This could very possibly be true since the Executioner s Axe procs haste. Give the monk a flowing black silk sash or a swirlspine belt and I suspect those
ygData.messageBody:
>
>I'll take your word for it. My friend who has a 35th monk on Sol Ro is
>always complaining the warrior with the executioner axe is outdamaging him.
>At 18th level in our group the warrior dual wielding Langseaxe and I forget
>what sure seems to outdamage our monk. Maybe it gets better later on.

This could very possibly be true since the Executioner's Axe procs haste.
Give the monk a flowing black silk sash or a swirlspine belt and I suspect
those results would change.

Anthem Dirgemaker
Level 43 Bard of Qeynos
Solusek Ro
